name: Pushy
body:
### Pushy
Pushy is a crossplatform, highly configurable and scalable push server. It's using Redis as its database and has a clean RESTful JSON api.

### Support or Contact
Feel free to submit any bug reports [here](https://github.com/godexsoft/pushy/issues).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
